import React, {useState, useContext} from 'react' import ContactContext from '../../context/contact/contactContext' const ContactForm = () => { const contactContext = useContext(ContactContext) const [contact, setContact] = useState({ name:'', email:'', phone:'', type:'personal' }) const {name, email, phone, type} = contact; const onChange = e => setContact({ ...contact, [e.target.name]: [e.target.value] }); return (

Add Contact

Contact Type

Personal {' '} Professional
) } export default ContactForm
